# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-service-l2vpn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/l2vpn/l2vpnservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/l2vpnservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161226.034053-25.zip" && unzip -q -o -B sdno-service-l2vpn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f sdno-service-l2vpn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8509
RUN echo Open-O sdno-service-l2vpn 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/l2vpn/l2vpnservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/l2vpnservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161226.034053-25.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
